text: Suppose that we are storing a heap in an array A. This is the sort of heap used for quickly finding the maximum element, so values increase as we go from a leaf to the root. Assuming A is as shown below, and we delete the largest element, in what position will the value 30 be after we reheapify? Alil: 90 70 80 60 50 10 15 25 35 40 30 (A)A[11] (B) A [10] Â©A[8] D A_]
